short_summary: High-Capacity Printer for RCMP F Division
description: Need to provide high-capacity printer. An option to extend the contract

full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Intent
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) F Division requires a 36-month lease for two monochrome (black and white) high-capacity production printers and one color high-capacity production printer.

#### Objective
This contract aims to purchase, deliver, install, and provide training for the equipment in both English and French languages. The contract includes two additional one-year option periods.

#### Technical Requirements
* Three printers are required, meeting the mandatory technical specifications outlined in Annex A
* Delivery should happen within 30 days from contract award

#### Timeline
* Tender closure date: 2023-05-24 14:00:00
* Amendment date: 2023-05-18
* Publication date: 2023-04-25

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to bidders participating in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA).

#### Solicitation Information
Solicitation number: BPM018755/22609
Reference number: SSC-23-00022609:T
Tender status: Expired
Contracting entity: Shared Services Canada

#### Contact Information
* Name: Katherine Ikeon
* Email: katherine.ikeson@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* Phone: 613-298-2147
* Fax: 613-123-4567

#### Attachments
Download the solicitation package from the following links:
* [link 1](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/E40F38E7-FEE8-42EC-BB39-6E755CB9C32B)
* [link 2](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/947107D5-BE58-4122-82F7-54086E5549F8)
* [link 3](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/593D7C2A-240E-4CCC-BF70-315A6015E687)
